name: Tetomatli
movement: 30 ft. walk, can fly up to 30 ft.
description: The Tetomatli is a large, powerful construct with difficult-to-damage bludgeoning attacks. It features a robust design that embodies chaos, with notable physical strength.
memorable: It can create shockwaves to disrupt nearby targets, and its head slam can destroy metal armor on a critical hit.
goals: To engage in combat and dominate the battlefield with its abilities.
relations: May be encountered alongside other constructs or in the service of a powerful creator.
environment: Typically found in locations designated for constructs or magical experimentation.
strengths: Immunity to several damage types, ability to inflict double damage to structures, and advantage on saving throws against spells.
weaknesses: Very low Intelligence, limited social interaction due to inability to speak.
attacks: Utilizes powerful melee attacks including Head Slam and Wing Buffet, both delivering substantial bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Tremors ability creates a shockwave that can knock enemies prone and impair their attack and check capabilities.
senses: Possesses 90 feet of tremorsense, detecting vibrations but blind beyond this range.
skills: Highly skilled in athletics, proficient in physical feats with good perception for awareness.
additional_information: Immunity to poison and psychic damage
Resistance to acid, fire, lightning, and nonmagical physical attacks
Magic weapons allow it to bypass nonmagical defenses
Ability to fly, but must be grounded at the start and end of its turn
Can destroy metal armor on a critical hit
spellcasting: Should be resistant to magical attacks and has a strong physical presence rather than spell capabilities.
test_queries: chaotic large creature with flying abilities
powerful melee attacker immune to poison
monster that destroys metal armor on critical hits
tremorsense construct that initiates powerful attacks
